## StandardCard() function

This Component renders the base result card.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function StandardCard(props: StandardCardProps): JSX.Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | [StandardCardProps](./answers-react-components.standardcardprops.md) | An object containing the result itself and any additional information needed to render the card |

JSX.Element

A React element for the result card
